plot outline: Sunil Mokashi, an insurance agent, turns into a businessman and doesn't plan on having a child for at least five years to set up his business. However, when his wife, Jayashree, becomes pregnant, he prefers abortion to changing his plan. But the abortion ends up jeopardising their future plans of turning proud parents, which leaves them no option but to turn to surrogacy. Not wanting any complications post the delivery of their child, the calculative Sunil draws a contract only to find himself at odds with the terms of his own contract.
